title: Chakra Heart Journey by ThunderBeat [FLAC]
description:
Starting with the Heart is the way the Ancient Mayans did the Chakra Journey. This CD is will center your being, bring in peace, Love, activate your higher self and become more aligned with Mother Earth!

YES all the chakras are on this CD in this order of transition:

Heart Chakra 6.28
Solar Plexus 6.42
Sacral Chakra 6.24
Root Chakra 6.54
Then it goes Back to the Heart 6.28
Throat Chakra 7.04
Third Eye Chakra 6.43
Crown Chakra 6.40

The 13 Indigenous GrandMother pow wow Drum was used on this CD. The GrandMothers did 4 days of prayer for the People & the Earth and then honored me with the Drum to record this Chakra Heart CD!
